CIRCULAR No.15 /2008 
 
SUBJECT:- ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE AIRCRAFT AT CIVIL 
AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON MEDICAL GROUNDS. 
 
 
In continuation of this Bureau circular No. 29/2002 dated 24-09-2002, the 
personnel security officer (one) of Mis Mayawati , Chief Minoster UP (Z+ 
protecte) is permitted to carry his weapon and ammunition on person or in his 
hand baggage on board the flight when using either the state plane of Govt. of UP 
or private aircraft only. 
 
2. 
The weapon will be carried in fully unloaded condition and its ammunition 
shall be kept separately while accompanying the dignitary in her ferry vehicle and 
while on board of such aircrafts as mentioned above.   
 
 
 
 
                                        (D.S.Chauhan)

Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
